english.segment1: Kicked and stabbed along the way, planning for the hour. Revenge a method, one of many. to consummate the change.
english.segment2: Why, what could you ever gain?. Nothing it seems except being lame. What, what could you ever lose?. Brutally wrong, its all a game.
english.segment3: Moving forward, leaving something. requires the unsaid. Be a man and let it all go, abandoning your pride.
english.segment4: Why, what could you ever gain?. Nothing it seems except being lame. What, what could you ever lose?. Brutally wrong, its all a game. (x 2)
english.segment5: Now its here, time to choose. You decide. what youll become.
english.segment6: Why, what could you ever gain?. Nothing it seems except being lame. What, what could you ever lose?. Brutally wrong, its all a game. (x 2)
